title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for integral

1 point is earned for the answer

For x < 0, f(x) = 0 when x = -1.37312
Let P = -1.37312.

stimulusHtml:

Volume=π ∫ P 0 ( ( f( x )+2 ) 2 −4 )dx=59.361 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@544F@
